meanings.sent1: People don't use paper maps anymore.
meanings.sent4: Her old phone feels like a relic anymore.
meanings.sent5: The sun doesn't set as early anymore.

meanings.sent1: I can't talk right now anymore.
meanings.sent5: The wind doesn't blow as strongly anymore.

meanings.definition: In the past, but not now
meanings.sent1: I used to be scared of the dark, but not anymore.
meanings.sent2: He was a picky eater, but not anymore.
meanings.sent3: The toy train doesn't work anymore.
meanings.sent4: The old tree doesn't bear fruit anymore.
meanings.sent5: The playground isn't as fun as it was anymore.
